suite.name: Automation Suite (ExtentReports for Reporting with ITestListeners)

test-method.name: testLoginWithValidCredentials
test-method.description: Test to verify login with valid credentials.

test-method.name: testLoginWithLockedCredentials

test-method.name: testLoginWithInvalidCredentials
test-method.description: Test to verify login with invalid credentials.
